constraint.description: Constructors of java.util.Date must not be used.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (dateType:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(forbiddenMethod:Method), (type:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(method:Method)-[:INVOKES]->(forbiddenMethod) WHERE dateType.fqn = 'java.util.Date' AND forbiddenMethod:Constructor RETURN method AS Method
